Melihat kaisar yang kejam dan gadis yang tampak sangat rapuh, Erica, semua orang memperkirakan bahwa dia tidak akan bertahan lama di harem ini, tetapi bertentangan dengan harapan semua orang, Erica secara bertahap menemukan bahwa sosok yang berbeda bersembunyi di bawah permukaan kejam Kaal Lakin. Dan Kaal juga menghabiskan waktu bersama Erica, yang tampak lemah, dan merasakan lukanya sembuh. Mereka merasakan kasih sayang satu sama lain, tetapi status mereka sebagai kaisar dan tunangannya tidak meninggalkan mereka sendirian sebagai sepasang kekasih...\n\n---\n[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58761025)\n\n**Official Translation:**\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/14202)","ko":"거대한 제국 란시아의 황제, 카알 라킨.\n잔혹한 성품의 황제로 인해 그의 하렘에서는 언제나 피의 비가 내린다.\n\n또 한 명의 후궁이 그의 손에 죽어 나가고\n그 자리를 채우게 된 노스앤드 영주의 딸 에리카 코르.\n\n잔혹한 황제와 한없이 연약해 보이는 소녀, 에리카를 보고 사람들은 모두 그녀가\n이 하렘에서 오래 살아남지 못할 것이라 예측하지만, 모두의 예상과는 달리 \n에리카는 점차 카알 라킨의 뒤틀린 표면 아래에 다른 모습이 숨어 있다는 것을 알게 되고\n카알 또한 나약해 보였던 에리카와 지내며, 자신의 상처가 아물어 가는 것을 느낀다.\n\n그렇게 그들은 서로에게 애틋함을 느껴 가지만 황제와 그의 약혼녀라는 그들의 신분은 그들을\n그저 사랑을 느껴가는 연인 관계로 내버려 두지 않는데….\n\n---\n[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58761025)\n\n**Official Translation:**\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/14202)","pt-br":"O Imperador do grande império Lancia, Kaalakin. He embarks on his destined journey when Mime is killed by a soldier and he is out to get revenge. Though there are already others that have been summoned to that world, it insists that she go, telling her that it'll grant her any wish in return. In response, she asks to have the strongest protection magic and requests for a function that allows her to summon any item as long as she googles for it. Thus begins her leisurely life in another world as she sets up a quiet and remote book café.\n\n---\nIn this charming tale, a woman gets transported to a fantasy world and pursues her own quest: opening a book café!\n\nTsukina is a single, thirty-something office worker whose favorite thing is curling up with a good book. So when she arrives in this strange new land, she decides to use her magical powers to create a cozy little book café instead. Her first customer is a handsome soldier who loves reading almost as much as she does. Ela deve se tornar uma vilã para conseguir o divórcio. Como que para zerar o tesouro real, ela esbanjou o luxo, xingou na frente dos outros e assediou o marido. ‘A propósito, quanto mais eu me comporto mal, mais obcecado você fica, você é um pervertido, por acaso?!’"},"links":{"al":"153438","ap":"ill-divorce-my-tyrant-husband","engtl":"https://www.webtoons.com/en/romance/divorcing-my-tyrant-husband/list?title_no=4942","kt":"pokgun-nampyeongwa-ihonhagetseumnida","mal":"151819","mu":"gtcsjbg","raw":"https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=797844"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0bc90acb-ccc1-44ca-a34a-b9f3a73259d0","name":{"en":"Reincarnation"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"ace04997-f6bd-436e-b261-779182193d3d","name":{"en":"Isekai"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"d14322ac-4d6f-4e9b-afd9-629d5f4d8a41","name":{"en":"Villainess"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

Об'єкт захоплення героїні це -...\n2. Через розрив заручин міледі виглядала стурбованою, тож я вирішила її підтримати\n3. Заручини моєї найкращої подруги розірвані. 54a63e87-ac35-4429-bd22-425288295c6b:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"54a63e87-ac35-4429-bd22-425288295c6b","title":{"en":"Color Engineering"},"lastChapter":"2","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"Gekigaka Yuichi Yokoyama (born 1967) draws wordless narratives of scenarios that verge on visual abstraction. Stripped of any detail that might orient them in the past, present or future, they record the self-determined activities of machines and architectural structures in a pre- or post-human universe. With his fourth volume for PictureBox, designed and edited by the artist himself, Yokoyama broaches significant new terrain: color! Color Engineeringreproduces both older and unseen imagery from the 2000s with dozens of color drawings and paintings that were executed in 2010 during a six-week open studio event held in Tokyo, at which the public was able to view Yokoyama at work. A selection of these canvases is reproduced here as gatefold pages, and is integrated among comic-strip sequences executed in a variety of techniques: photography, loose marker drawings, hyper-real portraiture and much more. These sequences continue his investigations into the world of machines, architecture and post-human fashion, and are the first Yokoyama narratives to provide insight into the artist's personal world, in details of his rural habitat."},"links":{"mu":"68302"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"256c8bd9-4904-4360-bf4f-508a76d67183","name":{"en":"Sci-Fi"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

Ему кажется, что эта мечта несбыточная, однако он всё же получает шанс изменить свою жизнь. Собеседование в \"Global Exus\" пройдёт в виде экзамена в игре?! У него с детства не было отца, сейчас его мать тяжело больна, и они на грани бедности, это возможность изменить всю его жизнь. Вооружённый лишь своей жёсткой натурой, Хён Ву приходит в \"Новый Мир\", чтобы завоевать его!\n\n---\n\n- [Original Webtoon \u003cWebtoon kakao\u003e](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%84%ED%81%AC/2391)\n\n---\n\n- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/12947)\n\n- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60137)","zh":"面试，是一件很恐怖的事情。去全球五百强的企业面试，更是地狱难度。他，为了摆脱生活的窘迫，挣脱贫穷的枷锁，鼓足了勇气来到了这家企业，却被告之面试内容就是玩游戏？！而这款游戏的要求只有一个，就是“不择手段的活下去！”\n\n---\n\n- [Original Webtoon \u003cWebtoon kakao\u003e](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%84%ED%81%AC/2391)\n\n---\n\n- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/12947)\n\n- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60137)"},"links":{"al":"143062","ap":"ark-taeha","engtl":"https://www.lezhinus.com/en/comic/ark_en","kt":"56523","mal":"168595","mu":"168651","nu":"ark","raw":"https://page.kakao.com/content/54997280"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"8c86611e-fab7-4986-9dec-d1a2f44acdd5","name":{"en":"Virtual Reality"}},{"id":"9438db5a-7e2a-4ac0-b39e-e0d95a34b8a8","name":{"en":"Video Games"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}
